name: Cinderella - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
name_original: Cinderella - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
description:
This version includes a preview of the book and 2 games that your kids will love: Memory Match & Jigsaw puzzle.
If you like the book, it can be purchased within the app.

Cinderella is an amazing storybook multilingual, illustrated by Edith López Salazar (Edetsu F.), with text and narrations that your kids will love.

Features:

1) Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
2) Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
3) English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Italian, German, Chinese, and Russian languages support.
4) Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
5) Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
6) A fun and challenging Memory Match game to increase your children's brain activity.
7) A Jigsaw puzzle game to have even more fun.

Did I mention about the amazing images?

Enjoy.
